title: Cunha (Bartolomeu de Vasconcelos da)
body: Appointed governor and captain general of Madeira on August 21, 1651, taking office on October 16 of the same year. Barbosa Machado says that he wrote several sonnets on the birth of Infante D. Pedro, the death of D. Maria de Ata√≠de, and Manuel de Galhegos. He is the father of the distinguished poet and writer Troilo de Vasconcelos da Cunha, who was born in Funchal in 1654. (See this name).

Funchal: Capital of the Island of Madeira.

Troilo de Vasconcelos da Cunha: Distinguished poet and writer, son of Bartolomeu de Vasconcelos da Cunha.

1651: Appointment as governor and captain general of Madeira.
1654: Birth of Troilo de Vasconcelos da Cunha.
